Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: AAS \AAS\ n. 1. an associate degree conferred for successful studies in applied science. [WordNet 1.5]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: aas \aas\ n. 1. a loose sleeveless outer garment made from aba cloth; worn by Arabs. overgarment, outer garment [WordNet 1.5]
AAS n : an associate degree in applied science [syn: {Associate in Applied Science}]
